choices.D: Cisco, Amazon Security Services, Google Credentials, Microsoft SCS, IBM Vault.
choices.A: CyberArk CCP, Cisco, Google Credentials, CyberArk, Azure Key Vault.
choices.C: Azure Key Vault, CyberArk CCP, HashCorp Vault, Thycotic Secret Server, BeyondTrust, CyberArk.
choices.B: CyberArk CCP, Azure Key Vault, Google Credentials, Amazon Security Services.

questions.question_text: Which of the following credentials stores have built in support in Orchestrator?

discussion.content: Orchestrator admite el uso de varios almacenes de credenciales en el tenant, y proporciona compatibilidad integrada para Azure Key Vault, CyberArk CCP, HashiCorp Vault, Thycotic Secret Server, BeyondTrust, AWS Secrets Manager y CyberArk.

choices.D: A State Machine consists of four primary components: States, Triggers, Transitions, and Actions.
choices.A: A State Machine is composed of States, Triggers, and Loops.
choices.C: A State Machine is made up of States, Transitions, Entry Actions, and Exit Actions.
choices.B: A State Machine comprises three main components: Sequences, Flowcharts, and Input/Output Arguments.

questions.question_text: Which of the following statements accurately describes the primary components of a State Machine in a workflow?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct.

questions.question_text: What is a pre-requisite for running InitAllApplications TestCase?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Answer is A because the others will run after the initAllApplications

https://docs.uipath.com/orchestrator/automation-cloud/latest/user-guide/about-monitoring

The Include Subfolders filter is displayed on all monitoring pages when a folder is selected, and it allows you to select whether the contents of the selected folder's subfolders are displayed.

questions.question_text: What is the functionality of the Include Subfolders filter in the Monitoring pages when a modern folder is selected?

choices.B: It enables you to sort the displayed data based on job priorities.
choices.D: It allows you to choose between background and foreground processes for the displayed data.
choices.A: It allows you to select whether the contents of the selected folder’s subfolders are displayed.
choices.C: It allows you to allocate licenses per machine for the displayed data.
